formal_name:
Ice Age™ Continental Drift: 
Arctic Games
description:
Ready to get wet, wild and wooly?

Team up with your favorite Ice Age characters in a continental competition of glacial proportions! Battle for treasure with the Herd and the Pirates in their craziest adventure yet!

Hop, Smash and Dash in 10 wild arctic events!
Battle to win gold, silver and bronze acorns.
Test your skills in Story and Free Play mode.
Challenge your friends in fast-paced multi-player action!
